content.text:
# 2022 Billie Jean King Cup Europe/Africa Zone Group II â€“ play-offs__disambig_1

The play-offs of the 2022 Billie Jean King Cup Europe/Africa Zone Group II were the final stages of the Group II zonal competition involving teams from Europe and Africa. Using the positions determined in their pools, the seven teams faced off to determine their placing in the 2022 Billie Jean King Cup Europe/Africa Zone Group II. The top two teams advanced to Group I, and the bottom two teams were relegated down to the Group III for 2023.

Promotional play-offs
The first-placed teams of each pool played against the second-placed teams of the other pool in head-to-head rounds. The winner of each round advanced to the 2023 Europe/Africa Zone Group I.

Relegation play-offs
The third-placed teams of the pools played against each other in a head-to-head round. The loser was relegated to 2023 Europe/Africa Zone Group III, alongside Finland who finished fourth in Pool B.
